pages.text: Yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta.
Zhe deng ren dique aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri.
Wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen.
Zhe que shi jiaohui, shui yuanyi juewu, shui keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu.
Chu zhenzhu yiyu wai, nimen jue buyiyu. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de renmen, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
Shi yi feng pai chuanda jiayin,
sui menglie chui dong zhe,
shi yi chuanbo ge wu,
er shi zhi fensan,
nai chuanshou jiaoxun zhe,
shi yi shi yuanliang huo jinggao zhe,
jinggao nimen de shi, shi biding fasheng de.
Dang xingsu andan de shihou,
dangtian ti polie de shihou,
dang shanluan feiyang de shihou,
dangzhong shizhe bei dingqi zhaoji de shihou,
qixian zai na ri ne?
Zai panjue zhi ri.
Ni zen neng zhidao panjue zhi ri, shi shenme?
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
Nandao wo meiyou huimie xian min ma?
Ranhou, wo shi hou min sui tamen er xiaomie.
Wo jiang zheyang chuzhi fanzui de ren.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
